sen.j: 手研耳命（たぎしみみのみこと、生年未詳 - 神武天皇76年(紀元前585年））は、古墳時代の皇族。
sen.e: Tagishimimi no mikoto (year of birth unknown - the 76th year of Emperor Jinmu's reign [B.C.585]), was a member of the Imperial family, who lived during the Kofun period (tumulus period).
sen.cmt: 神武天皇76年(紀元前585年）→定訳不明：the 76th year of Emperor Jinmu's reignとしました。
sen.e: Tagishimimi no mikoto (year of birth unknown - the 76th year of Emperor Jimmu's reign (585 B.C.)), was a member of the Imperial family, who lived during the Kofun period (tumulus period).
sen.cmt: Jinmuを jimmuに変更(n--> m)。B.C. 585 を585 B.C. に変更。鍵括弧を小括弧に変更。
sen.e: Tagishimimi no mikoto (year of birth unknown - 585 B.C.), was a member of the Imperial family, who lived during the Kofun period (tumulus period).
sen.cmt: Jimmu→Jinmuthe 76th year of Emperor Jinmu's reign (585 B.C.)→585 B.C.

sen.e: He was the son of Emperor Jinmu.
He was a son of Emperor Jimmu.
sen.cmt: Jinmuを jimmuに変更(n--> m)。sonの冠詞をtheから aに変更。
sen.e: He was a son of Emperor Jinmu.

sen.j: 母は、吾平津姫で、同母弟に岐須美美命（ただし古事記のみ登場）が、異母弟に綏靖天皇、神八井耳命、彦八井耳命がいる。
sen.e: His mother was Princess Ahiratsu hime, and in addition to Kisumimi no mikoto (he only appears in "Kojiki [The Records of Ancient Matters]), who was his younger half-brother by the same mother, he had younger half brothers by different mothers, who were Emperor Suizei, Kamuyaimimi no mikoto, and Hikoyaimimi no mikoto.
sen.cmt: 吾平津姫→Princess Ahiratsu-hime とPrincessを加えました。
sen.e: His mother was Princess Ahiratsu hime, and in addition to Kisumimi no mikoto (he only appears in "Kojiki (The Records of Ancient Matters)) as his younger half-brother by the same mother, he had younger half brothers by different mothers, who were Emperor Suizei, Kamuyaimimi no mikoto, and Hikoyaimimi no mikoto.
sen.cmt: 鍵括弧を小括弧に変更。「, who was his younger half-brother」の部分をas his younger half-brotherに変更。
sen.e: His mother was Princess Ahiratsu hime, and in addition to Kisumimi no mikoto (he only appears in "Kojiki (The Records of Ancient Matters)) as his younger half-brother by the same mother, he had younger half brothers by different mothers, who were Emperor Suizei, Kamuyaimimi no mikoto, and Hikoyaimimi no mikoto.

sen.j: 神武天皇の死去後、父神武の正妻ヒメタタライスズヒメを妻にし、彼女と神武の間に生まれた3人の異母兄弟を殺そうと計画していたため、そのうちの神八井耳命と神渟名川耳尊（のちの綏靖天皇）に殺された。
sen.e: After Emperor Jinmu's death, he took his father's lawful wife, Princess Himetataraisuzu hime, as his wife, and as he plotted the assassination his three half brothers born between the Princess and Emperor Jinmu, he was killed in turn by the two of the three targeted half brothers, Kamuyaimimi no mikoto and Kamununakawamimi no mikoto (Emperor Suizei).
sen.cmt: ヒメタタライスズヒメ→Princess Himetataraisuzu himeとPrincessを加えました。
sen.e: After Emperor Jimmu's death, he took his father's lawful wife, Princess Himetataraisuzu hime as his wife, and as he plotted the assassination of his three half brothers born between the Princess and Emperor Jimmu, he was killed in turn by the two of the three targeted half brothers, Kamuyaimimi no mikoto and Kamununakawamimi no mikoto (Emperor Suizei).
sen.cmt: Jinmuを jimmuに変更(n--> m)。assassinationの直後にofを追加。
sen.e: After Emperor Jinmu's death, he took his father's lawful wife, Princess Himetataraisuzu hime as his wife, and as he plotted the assassination of his three half brothers born between the Princess and Emperor Jinmu, he was killed in turn by the two of the three targeted half brothers, Kamuyaimimi no mikoto and Kamununakawamimi no mikoto (Emperor Suizei).

sen.j: 詳細はタギシミミの反逆を参照。
sen.e: For details, see the section of "Rebellion of Tagishimimi."
sen.cmt: タギシミミの反逆→定訳不明："Rebellion of Tagishimimi"としました。
sen.e: For details, see the section of "Rebellion of Tagishimimi."
For details, see the section of "Rebellion of Tagishimimi."
